programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: The Green Hornet, (2011, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a slacker by day, party animal by night... until he finds a serious career that's seriously cool: crime-fighting action hero. As the Green Hornet, he teams up with gadget wiz and martial arts master Kato to take down LA's underworld.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Comedy sensation Mike Myers stars with Nancy Travis in this hatchet-driven romantic comedy about a wedlock-shy coffee house poet who finally meets the perfect woman. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Swingers, (1996, Screwball)
programme.desc: In this laugh-out-loud indie comedy classic that launched the careers of its outstanding cast, two friends set out to rewrite modern dating from Los Angeles to Las Vegas.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: So I Married an Axe Murderer, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Comedy sensation Mike Myers stars with Nancy Travis in this hatchet-driven romantic comedy about a wedlock-shy coffee house poet who finally meets the perfect woman. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Horror)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Vampires)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Vampires)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: James Caan portrays a compulsive gambler who can't quit or win. He falls into debt to the mob for $40,000 but seems to relish the thrill of gambling against the long shot.

programme.title: Manhattan, (1979, Romance)
programme.desc: Woody Allen, Diane Keaton, Meryl Streep and Mariel Hemingway star in Woody Allen's extraordinary and funny film that explores the embattled life and loves of a successful New York comedy writer.

programme.title: Real Life, (1979, Mockumentaries)
programme.desc: In his directorial debut. Brooks presents a hilarious account of what happens to a typical American family when a group of filmmakers moves in with them to record "real life."

programme.title: The White Buffalo, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: The FBI sends a loner (Charles Bronson) to kidnap a mobster's mistress in Switzerland.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a society in which major league sporting events have replaced Sunday worship as the religion of choice, North Dallas Forty appears like a desecration at the altar.

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman he’s wanted all along!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Reaching the sea of clouds proves easier than surviving in it when giant sea creatures attack the Going Merry, Usopp nearly drowns in a cloud, and a strange sky knight issues the Straw Hats a warning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sail the white sea! The sky knight and the gate in the clouds!

programme.title: After hitching a ride on a speedy shrimp, the Straw Hats reach the land of Skypiea! The intrepid pirates have much to learn about their new surroundings, but a beautiful angel makes a perfect tour guide.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Godland, skypiea! Angels on a beach of clouds!

programme.title: Nami’s eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heaven’s Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The forbidden sacred ground! The island where god lives and heaven's judgement!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are no strangers to living on the wrong side of the law, but unpaid immigration fees and Nami’s assault of a White Beret earns Luffy’s crew a sentence of death by cloud drifting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Already criminals?! Skypiea's upholder of the law!

programme.title: Nami, Zoro, Chopper, and Robin are trapped aboard the Going Merry when it’s commandeered by a monstrous lobster! To rescue his crew, Luffy must venture onto the sacred grounds of Upper Yard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Is escape possible?! God's challenge is set in motion!

programme.title: Conis helps Luffy and his mates launch their rescue mission, but the rubber-man senses something amiss. When he presses her for answers, a vengeful god takes a shot at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A trap on lovely street! The almighty eneru!

programme.title: Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onward, crow! To the sacrifical altar!

programme.title: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp tangle with Satori and his exploding, snake-filled Surprise Clouds. The sky priest may look like a dancing dango, but the impact of his mantra leaves the pirates bloodied and boatless.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 10% survival rate! Satori, the mantra master!

programme.title: Usopp and Sanji try to regain control of the Crow, and Luffy stirs up a brutal barrage of bursting balls when he attacks Satori. Meanwhile, Chopper whistles for the Sky Knight to avoid becoming a sacrificial reindeer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of spheres! Desperate struggle in the lost forest!

programme.title: Chopper fights bravely to stop Shura from incinerating the Going Merry, but the little reindeer is no match for a sky priest. Gan Fall is on his way, but will the dispossessed deity arrive in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopper in danger! Former god vs. Priest shura!

programme.title: When Gan Fall is badly burned during his battle with Shura, Chopper musters the courage for a death-defying leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy may have finally discovered a way to defeat Satori!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Profound mystery! Ordeal of string and ordeal of love?!

programme.title: The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light the fire of shandora! Wyper, the warrior!

programme.title: While the Shandorians continue their battle for control of Upper Yard, the Straw Hats celebrate their happy reunion by swapping stories over a campfire and feasting on barbequed Skyshark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jaya, city of gold in the sky! Head for god's shrine!

programme.title: Laki’s pursuit of precious Vearth causes one of her Shandorian comrades to be injured during the battle with Ohm. As night falls on Upper Yard, the Straw Hats dream of gold while dancing with wolves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Festival on the night before gold-hunting! Feelings for vearth!

programme.title: The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter god eneru!! Farewell to the survivors!

programme.title: The Straw Hats scatter when their search for gold uncovers a giant python, and Gan Fall reveals the tragic story of Jaya’s arrival in the sky. Meanwhile, Wyper readies the Shandorians for a raid on Eneru’s shrine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A giant snake bares its fangs! The survival game begins!

programme.title: As the heartless god of Upper Yard eagerly anticipates the dawning of Sky Warefare, the Shandorian forces are savagely snared by the Ordeal of String, and Luffy wanders into the fight of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The deadly reject! War demon wyper's resolve!

programme.title: Zoro rushes to perfect a deadly technique known as the Flying Blade Attack. The move proves difficult to master, but it could be the key to the swordsman surviving a battle with the Shandorian warrior, Braham.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fierce midair battle! Pirate zoro vs. Warrior braham!

programme.title: Sanji and Usopp are driven to their knees by the electrifying presence of god, Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wyper’s Burn Bazooka, and Nami joins Gan Fall in a fight against two killer clones!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The roaring burn bazooka! Luffy vs. War demon wyper!

programme.title: Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swap cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard. Can the little reindeer discover his opponent’s lone weakness before it’s too late?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of the swamp! Chopper vs. Sky punk gedatsu!

programme.title: Nami and the Knight of the Sky team up to obliterate two bumbling, balloon-shaped bad guys, and God Eneru relies on his astounding invincibility to torment a noble Shandorian warrior.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unbeatable powers! Eneru's true form is revealed!

programme.title: Robin’s search for a mystical city of gold is interrupted by Yama, one of Eneru’s faithful servants. When the rampaging warrior destroys some ancient ruins, he provokes the wrath of Robin’s many fists of fury!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mystical city! The grand ruins of shandora!

programme.title: Priest Ohm silences Chopper with an attack from which few – if any – ever recover. Meanwhile, Luffy begins to notice something strange about his cave-like prison, and four fearsome warriors prepare for battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 0% survival rate! Chopper vs. Ohm, the sword wielding priest!

programme.title: Zoro, Gan Fall, Wyper, Ohm, and a prizefighting pooch gather for a ferocious free-for-all at the site of the Upper Ruins. While the battle rages, Luffy tries to punch his way out of the belly of a poisonous python!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climb giant jack! Deadly combat in the upper ruins!

programme.title: Zoro and Wyper are out to beat down the same bad guys, but will they realize it soon enough to survive a white-barbed death match of doom? Deep in the belly of the python, Nami and Luffy enjoy what could be a short-lived reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of iron! White barbed death match!

programme.title: Eager to end their battle, Zoro aims the awesome destructive power of his 108 Caliber Phoenix at the sinister Priest Ohm! Elsewhere, god demands that Robin help him search for a legendary golden bell.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: God Eneru begins a deadly rampage aimed at exterminating the heavenly beings of Skypiea, and the ruins of Shandora become the scene of a bloody contest where survival is the name of the game.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Collapsing upper ruins! The quintet for the finale!

programme.title: Gan Fall, Wyper, Zoro, and Robin join forces for an attack on God Eneru. Despite their furious onslaught, the four warriors prove powerless to harm the thunderous deity until Wyper utilizes the power of a mystical stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the ancient ruins! Sky god eneru's goal!

programme.title: God Eneru makes a shocking recovery from wounds that should have ended his reign of terror. Zoro and Wyper muster the strength for one final stand, and Nami must choose between her friends – and survival.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Ambition toward the endless vearth! The ark maxim!

programme.title: Luffy emerges from his serpentine tomb with one thing on his mind: revenge! As the rubber-man sets out to settle the score with God Eneru, Conis rushes to warn her people of their impending doom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: They finally clash! Pirate luffy vs. God eneru!

programme.title: As the citizens of the sky run for their lives, Eneru issues in the dawn of Deathpiea! Luffy is determined to stop the madman, but first he must discover a way to lay hands on the heinous holy man!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A handful of gold sends Luffy hurtling towards his death, Sanji and Usopp mount a midair rescue mission, and Nami prepares for an electrifying showdown with God Eneru!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy falls! Eneru's judgement and nami's wish!

programme.title: Usopp arrives just in time to save Nami from a lethal thunderbolt, but even their combined powers are no match for Eneru. While they scramble for an escape route, Sanji stealthily searches for a way to sabotage god’s ark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The two awaken! On the front lines of the burning love rescue!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Bandit leader Basara is determined to sniff out the location of the diamonds Lupin has hidden somewhere in India. Armed with his sinister invention, the Suicide Ray Gun, he tries to make Lupin talk, even trying his luck with a fake Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Trouble is all but guaranteed when a crime boss and an arms merchant join hands. The two set their eyes on Goemen's sword, which can split a tank in half! After hiring Fujiko to steal it, they transform the sword into an invincible flying weapon of war.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen and Gomen have sent a letter saying they are being held captive in a small but terrifying village. Lupin arrives in the village to rescue them, but Jigen and Goemon are acting oddly.
programme.sub-title: The Sound of the Devil's Bell Calls Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Don Kecchi, the wealthiest man in America, is terminally ill and has announced that he's donating his entire fortune to charity. However, Lupin steals Kecchi's money and shoots Fujiko right in front of Inspector Zenigata!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Margaret Tiffany, the owner of Tiffany's and a TV anchor, hires Lupin and his gang to rob her jewelry store on live TV. Initially, Lupin refuses, but ends up having to go through with it thanks to Fujiko's wild spending habits.
programme.sub-title: Christmas is in the Goddess' Hands

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A princess of a small Silk Road country has been kidnapped. Lupin and his gang are persuaded to rescue Princess Yasmin in exchange for a stomach full of holy curry meant for the gods. However, the kidnapping was a trap to lure Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Here comes Beauty, the assassin hired by ICPO Headquarters to knock off Lupin! Overwhelmed by Beauty's powerful DumDum bullets, Lupin narrowly escapes with his life thanks to Jigen's quick thinking.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang head to the isolated country of Kimasan, after hearing the country possesses mountains of treasure. They sneak across the border but are quickly captured by Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the giants who rule the country.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's Great Journey to the West

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Casino Paradise is an artificial island owned and operated by Domino, a casino tycoon. Domino decides to run for President and brags that with $500 million to spend, the only way he can lose is if Lupin steals his campaign funds!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Political fixer Pomade Jaws trusts no one, not even his wife Laura. He's stored the scandalous secrets of various world leaders inside a voice-activated safe.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Pops Fell in Love With

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen and Goemon have turned themselves in to the FBI, but it's all part of the plan. Their real goal is to break out old man Clyde Barlow, who was once known as a genius bank robber, to get his help with their heist of the National Super Bank.
programme.sub-title: A Classical Thief and a Myna

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Isamu Kondo III, grandson of the leader of the Shinsengumi, hires Lupin and his gang to recover a golden cannon sunk by the Shogunate forces in the Tsugaru Strait. After much effort, the valuable golden cannon is finally recovered from the deep ocean.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Ellery Queen, the owner of the legendary sapphire called "The Eye of Solomon," is also the owner of a football team. Lupin, coming for the sapphire as announced, discovers Queen on the brink of death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The 3rd Thieves Olympic is about to be held in Japan, and Lupin and Jigen are in it to win it! After winning the first and second Thieves Olympic, if they also win this year's getaway race, they'll become the first-ever Triple-Crown winners!
programme.sub-title: Through the Flowers or Storms, The Thieves Race

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The world's largest diamond has been discovered in South Africa and Lupin has his eyes on the prize. But as it turns out, stealing it is the easy part!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko decides to marry Huffner for his jewelry collection, disregarding the rumor that Huffner's brides always die a mysterious death within a few weeks of their wedding. Turns out, he's also a collector of brides and likes them permanently preserved!
programme.sub-title: A Wedding Dress Doesn't Suit Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Jigen receives a letter from Sister Angelica and heads to the African country of Borodias. Sister Angelica wants Jigen's help to rescue Dr. Othello, the leader of the country's independence movement.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO tries a different approach to capturing Lupin: Astrology. It enlists the help of Marianne, a clairvoyant who can read Lupin's actions using astrological predictions and her crystal ball.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko calls Lupin from Professor Pot's lab, but since Lupin is half-asleep, Jigen takes the call instead. Fujiko claims Professor Pot has accidentally invented a robot that manufactures diamonds, but Jigen doesn't believe a word she says and hangs up.
programme.sub-title: Diamon's Shining in the Robot's Eye

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko has invited Lupin and company to a classical concert conducted by Kyoransky from the International Philharmonic. After they get a good look at Kyoransky's baton, studded with a a diamond worth at least 200 million yen.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes to prison intent on making Silver tell what he did with the loot, only to discover that a new top-of-the-line prison was built over the site where he hid the money. Will the operation to trade an execution for the recovery of the money succeed?
programme.sub-title: The Last Gift in Prison is Cup Ramen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the Golden Bell, symbol of the monarchy of Beltenberg and precious tourist attraction. However, the bell that sparkles in the belfry is just a brass replica.
programme.sub-title: Fujiko, Men are A Sorry Lot!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime Feature Films)
programme.desc: 2029 – A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" – a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victim’s memory.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: The most towering myth of all time meets up with the mission of a real man in this action-adventure thriller that reveals the famed symbol of courage as he’s never been seen before: finding the hero’s heart that beats beneath his colossal image.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Back In The Saddle, (1941, Western)
programme.desc: When pollution poisons hundreds of cattle, Gene Autry, faces trouble from all sides. Originally released in 1941, this film features Gene's signature song and his lovable sidekick, Smiley Burnette.

programme.title: Blue Montana Skies, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry heads North to apprehend fur smugglers plundering the trappers' pelts, and then return to the U.S. When the trail leads to the H-H dude ranch owned by a beautiful gal, the action heats up.

programme.title: The Strawberry Roan, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Gene’s first color film stars Champion in the title role as a wild outlaw stallion, branded a killer, and the two-fisted cowboy who fights off a gun-crazed posse to win justice for the noble animal.

programme.title: Sons Of New Mexico, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry becomes the guardian of a wayward boy who is in debt. Gene sends him to the New Mexico Military Institute, where he falls in with bad companions and is framed for a murder of an ex-jockey.

programme.title: Rim Of The Canyon, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry, playing a dual role as his father and himself, is stranded by thieves who are searching for a stolen $30,000. A schoolteacher aids Gene with his search for the outlaws and the treasure.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Old School, (2003, Screwball)
programme.desc: Three men are disenchanted with life and try to recapture their college days.

programme.title: Without A Paddle, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Seth Green, Matthew Lillard and Dax Shepard star in this offbeat comedy as childhood friends whose lives have drifted apart but must reunite following the sudden death of a fourth friend.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Old School, (2003, Screwball)
programme.desc: Three men are disenchanted with life and try to recapture their college days.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Disturbia, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Living under three months' house arrest, Kale Brecht (Shia LaBeouf, Transformers) passes his days spying on the neighbors. It's all fun and games until things take a horrifying turn for the worse.

programme.title: Carol seeks out an old friend living alone in a wilderness teeming with walkers; survivors make the perilous trek to a new home.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A small rescue mission braves a dangerous herd in their hunt for a missing comrade, only to discover a surprising threat that could doom them all.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The communities thought they could build a better future separately, but the recent loss of one of their own drives them to band together; new leaders rise when a disturbing and dangerous threat is unmasked; an escaped captive revisits his past.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl Dixon's arrival to France sets off a violent chain of events that inadvertently puts a young boy at the heart of a growing religious movement in danger; Daryl agrees to help shepherd the boy to safety in exchange for help returning to America.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Daryl, Isabelle, Laurent and Sylvie face trouble on the road; Isabelle remembers the day the hungry ones appeared; Laurent struggles to fit in.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: The group arrives in Paris, where Isabelle confronts her past while growing closer to Daryl; Codron seeks help from the leader of a growing nationalist movement called Pouvoir, putting the Union of Hope and Laurent under dangerous scrutiny.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Daryl and Isabelle must negotiate with Quinn, the proprietor of the underground Demimonde club, the last vestige of art and expression in Paris.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Daryl faces old demons, recalling the circumstances that landed him in France; Isabelle's sacrifice forces her to consider drastic measures; Genet commences a celebration for the people of Paris.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Genet ensures to strengthen her base of power; Daryl has a job to do before he can go back to America.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Carol maps a path toward Daryl that forces her to confront her past; Daryl, Isabelle, and Laurent struggle to define their roles at the Nest, under the watchful supervision of Losang; Daryl and Nesters launch a rescue mission for Fallou and Emile.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: La Gentillesse Des Étrangers

programme.title: Carol and Ash take an unexpected detour during their journey to find Daryl; Daryl, Isabelle, and Sylvie uncover a dark new threat at the Nest. Losang's faith is tested.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Moulin Rouge

programme.title: Carol's hunt for information leads her to dangerous places and a new set of horrors; Daryl, Isabelle, and Fallou race to save one of their own; Pouvoir regroups.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Pouvoir attacks the Nest and Losang and Isabelle confront each other.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Le Paradis Pour Toi

programme.title: Old friends and enemies realign in surprising ways as a new faction of survivors from the Nest and Pouvoir hunt down Laurent; Daryl struggles to forgive himself and Carol's lies come to a head.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Vouloir, C'est Pouvoir

programme.title: An exit strategy is charted from France; the Rooftop Community helps map a new plan for the future.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Au Revoir Les Enfants

programme.title: A chance encounter provides a potential way home; Daryl makes a tough decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako befriends a little girl named Mie who is a huge fan of Sailor Moon. Meanwhile, Ail and An send a Cardian to steal energy from young children.
programme.sub-title: The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Mamoru find themselves looking after a baby boy while his mother is recovering from having her energy stolen by a Cardian.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A school festival is going to be held at T.A. Girls’ Academy, which Rei attends. Usagi and Ami go to check up on her.
programme.sub-title: The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei's Song

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and Makoto are trying to figure out who the Moonlight Knight is. Makoto volunteers to investigate by getting closer to Seijuro.
programme.sub-title: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls get into an argument over who gets to play Snow White in the upcoming play with Mamoru.
programme.sub-title: Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An's Project Snow White

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian shows up.
programme.sub-title: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.
programme.sub-title: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: While visiting Seijuro and Natsumi's apartment, Usagi and Mamoru come under attack by the Makai Tree.
programme.sub-title: True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky. Calling herself 'Usagi,' the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.
programme.sub-title: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi wakes up to find that Chibi-Usa has gone missing. Meeting up with Mamoru, the two search for Chibi-Usa, finding her alone at the park.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Devastated: Mamoru Declares a Break-Up

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is offered a chance to study abroad in Germany. Knowing how important this is to her, Usagi and the others urge Ami to accept the offer.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei's grandfather is upset that Hikawa Shrine has had fewer female visitors lately. He then decides to retire as head priest to start a new business.
programme.sub-title: Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei's New Special Technique

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus sends down Petz and her Droid to search and capture Chibi-Usa. Chibi-Usa is calling someone telling her she wants to go home.
programme.sub-title: In Search of the Silver Crystal: Chibi-Usa's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Makoto clash over their opposing views on love. Usagi takes the girls to a accessory shop, unaware that Petz and Calaveras run the place.
programme.sub-title: Dispute Over Love: Minako and Makoto's Conflict

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa's class is having a parent-child curry party. After hearing that neither Kenji nor Ikuko can attend, Usagi decides to go in their place.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Parental Love: The Curry Romance Triangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls enjoy some vacation time on an island. Chibi-Usa and Rei get into a small fight, causing an angry Chibi-Usa to go out to the sea alone.
programme.sub-title: The Beach, the Island and a Vacation: The Guardians' Break

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa leaves the house after being scolded by Usagi. Chibi-Usa begins to cry, which draws the attention of Rubeus and the Four Spectre Sisters.
programme.sub-title: Protect Chibi-Usa: Clash of the Ten Warriors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru has a dream which a voice warns him that being with Usagi will bring her great misfortune. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon is attacked by a Droid.
programme.sub-title: Awaken the Sleeping Beauty: Mamoru's Distress

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman predicts that Chibi-Usa will appear at Hikawa Shrine. Learning of this, Rubeus orders Koan to go down there and eliminate their target.
programme.sub-title: Battle of the Flames of Love! Mars vs. Koan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami enters the World Chess Tournament, but Bertheir is also there, forcing Ami to transform and reveal her identity as a Sailor Guardian to the enemy.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus gives Petz and Calaveras one last chance to eliminate Rabbit and the Sailor Guardians once and for all.
programme.sub-title: Rubeus the Heartless: The Tragic Sisters

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Eager to return to the future, she steals Usagi's Silver Crystal and flees, only to be ambushed by Rubeus.
programme.sub-title: A UFO Appears: The Sailor Guardians Abducted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus succeeds in taking four of the five Sailor Guardians prisoner. He demands that Sailor Moon bring Chibi-Usa and the Silver Crystal to him.
programme.sub-title: Defeat Rubeus: The Battle in Space

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa falls into a coma. Usagi and the others are at a loss, when a Sailor Guardian calling herself Sailor Pluto suddenly appears before them.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious New Guardian: Sailor Pluto Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Black Moon clan sends down its next operative, Esmeraude, to open the Dark Gate in 20th century Tokyo.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is still depressed over Mamoru calling off their relationship. Ami and Mako try to cheer her up by taking Usagi to a promise ring workshop.
programme.sub-title: Shared Feelings: Usagi and Mamoru in Love Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A strange new flu is causing everyone to get sick, including the Sailor Guardians. Minako takes it upon herself to look after her sick friends.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Artemis is out to prove he is capable after being teased by Luna. He encounters a suspicious-looking man who is gathering stray animals.
programme.sub-title: Artemis's Adventure: The Monster Animal Kingdom

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The school test results are posted, and Ami is at the top of her class. She finds herself becoming isolated after rumors that she cheated on the test.
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: After being out sick, Chibi-Usa returns to school eager to see her friends. But to her surprise, her friends and teachers begin attacking her.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Gate Is Completed? The Targeted Elementary School

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa decides to return to save her mother. With support from the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask, she opens the Door of Space and Time.
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Arriving in the future, the Sailor Guardians stand in shock as they see the ruins of what used to be Crystal Tokyo.
programme.sub-title: The Shocking Future: Dimande's Dark Ambition

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask rescues Sailor Moon from Black Moon’s castle. But before they can all celebrate, a giant dragon appears to destroy the Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Marauders, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: FBI agents (Christopher Meloni, Dave Bautista) uncover a conspiracy while trying to nail a group of deadly bank robbers.

programme.title: Den of Thieves, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: An elite unit of the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department squares off against a crew of ex-military men who hatch an elaborate plan for a seemingly impossible heist -- the city's Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: Margin Call, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: When an analyst uncovers information that could ruin them all, the key players (Kevin Spacey, Paul Bettany) at an investment firm take extreme measures to control the damage.

programme.title: Crypto, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A Wall Street banker connects a small-town art gallery to a global conspiracy, putting his own family in grave danger.

programme.title: Arbitrage, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Desperate to sell his empire, a hedge-fund magnate (Richard Gere) seeks help from a former associate to cover up a critical error.

programme.title: Marauders, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Dose Dupla

programme.title: O Estrangeiro

programme.title: Sem Perdão
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vítima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajudá-la em sua vingança. Para convencê-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7
programme.desc: A morte de um senador americano faz o ex-agente da CIA Paul abandonar a aposentadoria e se juntar a um jovem oficial do FBI em uma eletrizante operação internacional para desvendar os muitos mistérios por trás do crime.

programme.title: Pilotos de Elite
programme.desc: Depois de se formarem na academia de aeronáutica, um grupo de pilotos ousados entram para a equipe de elite militar chinesa, onde a rivalidade poderá colocar tudo a perder quando uma ameaça terrorista e uma conspiração ameaçam o país.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida.

programme.title: Zona Mortal
programme.desc: Um criminoso consegue fugir de paraquedas quando é transportado em um avião da polícia. Por causa disso, o agente Pete Nessip que o acompanhava é suspenso, mas decide procurar o preso fugitivo por conta própria.

programme.title: A Maldição da Bruxa
programme.desc: Depois de regressar à sua cidade natal, uma adolescente é hostilizada pelos aldeões que acreditavam que sua mãe desaparecida era uma bruxa. Agora, eles suspeitam que a filha possa ter os mesmos poderes sombrios.

programme.title: Cemitério Maldito
programme.desc: Para a maioria das família, mudar-se é um novo começo. Mas para os Creeds, ele pode ser o começo do fim.

programme.title: Renascido das Trevas
programme.desc: No período entre as duas guerras mundiais, a família alemã Wollner recebe uma proposta tentadora do Terceiro Reich: hospedar o professor Richard With em sua fazenda em Morgan County, Virginia.

programme.title: O Espelho
programme.desc: Uma mulher tenta exonerar seu irmão, condenado por assassinato, provando que o crime foi cometido por um fenômeno sobrenatural.

programme.title: A Face da Morte
programme.desc: Enquanto tenta superar a morte da mãe, Ashley vai para sua nova faculdade onde escuta uma lenda urbana sobre um 'serial killer' cujo apelido virtual é "Smiley". O assassino só pode ser visto na internet!

programme.title: Jessabelle: O Passado Nunca Morre
programme.desc: Uma jovem é forçada a voltar para a casa de seu pai, na Louisiana, quando um acidente de trânsito a deixa incapacitada, sem poder usar as pernas.

programme.title: Assassinato em Gosford Park
programme.desc: Na Inglaterra dos anos 30, um grupo de arrogantes ricos e famosos se reúne para um fim de semana de descanso em um resort de caça. Mas, quando ocorre um assassinato, cada um desses personagens interessantes se torna suspeito.

programme.title: Os Suspeitos
programme.desc: Cinco criminosos de carreira são apanhados no enredo labiríntico do filme que envolve um gênio do crime intrigante, raramente visto e quase lendário chamado Keyser Soze.

programme.title: Cidade do Ódio
programme.desc: Roy é um ladrão aposentado que se une ao seu irmão e dois cúmplices para um último trabalho, assaltar uma joalheria. O assalto dá certo, mas ele é traído por um dos bandidos, que mata seu irmão. Roy agora quer se vingar do antigo comparsa.

programme.title: Submersos
programme.desc: Acontecimentos estranhos ocorrem em um submarino da Segunda Guerra Mundial.

programme.title: A Face Oculta da Lei
programme.desc: A investigação de um roubo com homicídio desencadeia uma série de eventos que farão com que um policial corrupto do LAPD questione suas táticas.

programme.title: Red Stone: Caçada Mortal
programme.desc: Um adolescente testemunha o assassinato de seu irmão mais velho nas mãos de um senhor do crime local. Quando ele encontra uma pedra valiosa que seu irmão havia escondido, ele percebe que um preço logo estará em sua cabeça.

programme.title: Juízo Final
programme.desc: Trinta anos após devastar a Escócia, um vírus mortal atinge a Inglaterra. Com milhões de vidas em jogo, o governo contará com a ajuda da major Eden Sinclair para encontrar a solução enquanto ainda há tempo.

programme.title: O Último Dia
programme.desc: Uma tempestade apocalíptica ameaça devastar um país inteiro. É decretado estado de emergência enquanto o caos estiver instaurado.

programme.title: A Invasão - Ocupação Alienígena
programme.desc: Dois anos após a aterrissagem de alienígenas na Terra, os sobreviventes de Sydney, Austrália, lutam em uma guerra desesperada enquanto o número de mortos continua a aumentar. Uma última batalha é a esperança da humanidade.

programme.title: Fuga do Vulcão
programme.desc: Quando um avião comercial fica preso dentro de um círculo de vulcões em erupção, os passageiros e a tripulação precisam encontrar uma maneira de sobreviver - sem aterrissar.

programme.title: Primeira Chegada
programme.desc: Alex está flutuando inconsciente em um lago quando a luz de um OVNI a salva, aumentando suas habilidades, como telecinese e poder de cura. Seu amigo Sean a ajuda. As autoridades a querem - não apenas por roubar um carro da polícia.

programme.title: Os Guardiões
programme.desc: A história é ambientada na Guerra Fria e acompanha um esquadrão de heróis reunidos pela extinta União Soviética. Depois de passar anos escondendo suas identidades, eles terão enfrentar uma perigosa força do passado.

programme.title: Cão de briga
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Jogo sujo
programme.desc: Após assaltar um cassino de Las Vegas, apenas um dos cinco integrantes de uma gangue consegue escapar. O fugitivo decide apagar qualquer memória do seu passado e se torna um xerife. Dez anos depois, os outros quatro ladrões rastreiam o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Fim da Linha
programme.desc: Um guarda de segurança de shopping, e ex-agente federal antidrogas, cruza o caminho de um grande traficante de drogas após salvar uma mulher que estava em perigo.

programme.title: A Face Oculta da Lei
programme.desc: A investigação de um roubo com homicídio desencadeia uma série de eventos que farão com que um policial corrupto do LAPD questione suas táticas.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança!

programme.title: Segredos de um crime
programme.desc: Malcolm é um detetive respeitado pelos colegas policiais. Um dia, no entanto, ele acidentalmente atropela um garoto em uma bicicleta. Apesar de chamar a ambulância imediatamente, a vítima corre sério risco de morte.

programme.title: Liga dos Deuses
programme.desc: A história conta como o Rei Zhou de Shang se torna um tirano devido às astúcias de Daji, um espírito vixen que está disfarçado como uma de suas concubinas.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América
programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal
programme.desc: Manji é um samurai altamente qualificado que torna-se amaldiçoado com a imortalidade após uma lendária batalha. Ele decide ajudar uma jovem que está movida pelo ódio e pela sede de vingança.

programme.title: Ataque dos Zumbis
programme.desc: Um empregado medíocre de uma fabricante de armas precisa sobreviver ao caos dentro do escritório quando seus colegas se transformam em maníacos assassinos depois de tomarem uma misteriosa bebida.

programme.title: Todo Mundo Ama Minha Mãe
programme.desc: Uma dupla de mãe e filho são inadvertidamente despachados em um contêiner de Londres para o Marrocos com nada além de seus pijamas. A aventura os leva pela Espanha e França em uma jornada para voltar para casa e reconstruir seu relacionamento rochoso.

programme.title: JACKASS: O Filme
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville e seus companheiros corajosos e estúpidos fazem estripulias absurdas em nome da diversão. Eles invadem o Japão, onde se disfarçam de pandas, atacam um campo de golfe e enfrentam jacarés.

programme.title: Relação Explosiva
programme.desc: Charlie Bronson abandonou a vida do crime, quando costumava ser o motorista oficial durante roubos. Hoje, ele adotou uma nova identidade graças ao programa de proteção às testemunhas.

programme.title: A Filha do Meu Melhor Amigo
programme.desc: David e Paige são vizinhos e amigos de Terry e Carol. Por conta disso, os filhos do primeiro casal, Vanessa e Toby, se tornaram amigos de Nina. Mas ela sempre foi meio rebelde e acabou saindo de casa logo. Depois de cinco anos, ela retorna. .

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: Os jovens nova-iorquinos Alex e Nancy encontraram um lugar perfeito para compartilhar um futuro brilhante: o térreo de um belo e velho duplex, mas este vem com um acessório que eles não esperavam.

programme.title: Como Casar com um Milionário?
programme.desc: Este filme é um guia para quem sonha com um relacionamento feliz! O longa conta a história de Alicja que vai a um curso ministrado pela autora de guias de best-sellers, que revela métodos comprovados de sedução que funcionam mesmo nos casos complicados.

programme.title: Senhora Presidente
programme.desc: Após um ano no cargo, a presidente está exausta e decide sair uma noite disfarçada, para evitar chamar a atenção do público. Ela inicia um romance inesperado com um homem que não faz ideia de quem ela realmente é.

programme.title: Tudo acontece em Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Drew Baylor é designer que, em um belo dia, tem sua vida jogada de pernas para o alto. A caminho de Elizabethtow, Drew conhece Claire. Ela é bonita e decidiu acompanhar Drew em sua jornada de volta para casa.

programme.title: Quase casados
programme.desc: Depois de perceber que ela perseguia um relacionamento romântico com o cara errado quando estava no ensino médio, uma jovem retorna à sua pequena cidade para encontrar sua antiga paixão e declarar suas intenções românticas para ele.

programme.title: Um Perfil Para Dois
programme.desc: Pierre é um viúvo aposentado que não sai de casa há mais de dois anos, e agora tem a chance de voltar a viver novamente com a ajuda da internet. Isso porque através de Alex, um homem contratado por sua filha para ensiná-lo a usar o computador.

programme.title: Ligados pelo Amor
programme.desc: Com Lily Collins. Um aclamado escritor, sua ex-esposa e seus filhos adolescentes chegam a um acordo com as complexidades do amor em todas as suas formas ao longo de um ano tumultuado.

programme.title: The Space Between
programme.desc: Marco, um talentoso chef italiano, desiste de sua carreira e volta para a Itália para cuidar de seu pai doente. Lá, ele conhece Olivia, uma jovem australiana alegre e cheia de vida, que irá virar sua vida de cabeça para baixo.

programme.title: Uma Pousada de Presente
programme.desc: Quando a mulher de negócios Jennifer é informada de que seus pais viajarão sem ela para as festas, ela decide deixar sua vida agitada na cidade de São Francisco e visitar a pousada da avó no Alasca, que ela herdou para reformar e vender.

programme.title: Entre o Amor e a Fama
programme.desc: Uma estrela de reality show deixa Hollywood e se reencontra em uma comunidade Amish, em Nebraska, onde deve decidir entre permanecer em sua nova realidade ou retornar à antiga.

programme.title: Sete dias
programme.desc: Depois de 12 anos juntos, Tim e May decidem se casar. Tim trabalha demais e muitas vezes está ausente, enquanto May fica sobrecarregada e estressada com a organização da festa. Faltam apenas sete dias para o casamento. Será que tudo vai dar certo?

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: O chofer de uma rica família envia sua filha Sabrina a Paris para ela superar uma paixão pelo playboy da família, David. Ela volta e atrai a atenção de David, que está para se casar. O irmão dele, Linus, tenta impedir, mas também se encanta com ela.

programme.title: O Pretendente
programme.desc: Década de 1920. Após fazer um anúncio prometendo um dote generoso, um pai encontra um marido para sua filha. Será que o casamento arranjado poderá se transformar em amor verdadeiro?

programme.title: Vale dos Deuses
programme.desc: Entrelaça a tradição Navajo com um bilionário recluso e seu futuro biógrafo, criando uma visão fascinante, misteriosa e idiossincrática da América.

programme.title: Agora Estamos Sozinhos
programme.desc: Num futuro não muito distante, algo deixou o planeta devastado. Durante muito tempo Del (Peter Dinklage) julga-se o último representante da Humanidade. Habituado à solidão, ele quase se sente feliz com a tranquilidade dos dias.

programme.title: Rebeldes
programme.desc: Esse filme é sobre quatro alunas de ensino médio que descobrem que todas estão sendo obrigadas a ter relações sexuais com o professor de biologia. Essa descobrta faz com que se tornem aliadas e amigas. Logo depois, conseguem a vingança do professor.

programme.title: Alexandria
programme.desc: Drama histórico ambientado no Egito romano sobre um escravo que se volta para a maré crescente do cristianismo na esperança de buscar a liberdade enquanto se apaixona por sua amante, a professora de filosofia e matemática Hipácia de Alexandria

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: O líder afro-americano Malcolm X tem o pai assassinado pela Klu Klux Klan e sua mãe internada por insanidade. Preso aos 20 anos de idade, Malcolm se converte ao islamismo e passa a pregar seus ideais.

programme.title: A Vingança de Ulzana
programme.desc: Arizona, século XIX. Quando um grupo de índios apaches desertores, liderados pelo terrível Ulzana, começa a saquear e massacrar as pessoas que vivem nos campos.

programme.title: O Grande Búfalo Branco
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1874 Wild Bill Hickok vai para o Velho Oeste, usando o nome de James Otis, pois precisa caçar um búfalo branco que sempre lhe provoca estranhos pesadelos.

programme.title: O Soldo do Diabo
programme.desc: Virgil Renchler é o rico proprietário do rancho Império Dourado, autoridade absoluta sobre os seus funcionários.

programme.title: O Homem com a Morte nos Olhos
programme.desc: Na cidade de Hard Times, um estranho cavalga e aterroriza o pequeno povoado. Ele mata vários habitantes da cidade, incluindo Fee, o fundador da cidade.

programme.title: A Pistola do Mal
programme.desc: Gunfighter Lorn Warfield volta para casa após uma ausência de três anos. Lorn encontra seu rancho em ruínas. Seu vizinho, Owen Forbes, informa Lorn que seu rancho foi invadido pelos apaches que sequestraram sua esposa e dois filhos.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Maratona da Morte
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman (Rain Man) interpreta o simpático universitário e maratonista do título que se vê preso numa intriga de assassinato envolvendo o fugitivo nazista Christian Szell.

programme.title: Cowboy do Asfalto
programme.desc: Bud Davis é operário de uma refinaria do Texas. À noite, troca seu capacete por um chapéu e vai para o Gilleys, o bar mais popular de Houston.

programme.title: ESTREIA - Voltar a Morrer
programme.desc: Mike é um detetive de Los Angeles especialista em procurar desaparecidos. Mas não sabe o que fazer para ajudar uma vítima com amnésia que sofre com pesadelos aterrorizantes. Através de hipnose, Church chega a uma descoberta espantosa.

programme.title: O Legionário
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propósito. Para fugir dos gângsters que buscam vingança, resolve se alistar na Legião Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inóspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Caçadores de Emoção
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em círculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladrões que, como marca registrada, usam máscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: Forças do Mal
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família distante de uma montanha durante a erupção de um vulcão e lutar contra uma horda de zumbis cheios de lava trazidos à vida por uma maldição.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Mega Python vs. Gatoroid
programme.desc: Depois que uma espécie de píton gigante invade os pântanos, os guardas florestais criam jacarés mutantes para combater a ameaça. Logo, a batalha entre enormes pítons e enormes jacarés ameaça toda a Flórida.

programme.title: O Palhaço
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Fada Dos Dentes
programme.desc: O conto de uma fada dos dentes mortal ganha vida e começa a aterrorizar uma pequena comunidade.

programme.title: Pânico a Bordo
programme.desc: Sob uma poderosa maldição maia, as cobras nascem dentro de uma jovem, devorando-a lentamente por dentro. Sua única chance de sobrevivência é um xamã poderoso que vive do outro lado da fronteira.

programme.title: Infidelidade - S1E0
programme.desc: Uma viagem de final de semana se transforma em um pesadelo quando um casal adúltero é obrigado a participar de um jogo doentio de sobrevivência com seu sequestrador.

programme.title: Norman - Confie em Mim - S1E0
programme.desc: Norman Oppenheimer é um picareta do mercado financeiro que tenta sua sorte na cidade de Nova York. Tentando ser amigo de todos, ele força seu caminho até se infiltrar no círculo interno de ricaços e de figurões da política.

programme.title: Robo-Dog - S1E0
programme.desc: O cãozinho de Tyler sofre uma morte trágica, deixando o garoto extremamente entristecido. Usando uma superbateria, Tom, o pai de Tyler, cria um cão-robô para o filho. O problema é que o chefe de Tom está disposto a tudo para obter a superbateria.

programme.title: A Gangue Zip Zap - S1E0
programme.desc: Os irmãos gêmeos Zip e Zap são enviados para uma escola muito rígida. O diretor é um homem muito bravo e que repudia qualquer forma de lazer. Cansados dessa situação, Zip e Zap formam um grupo para poder fazer suas travessuras e desafiar o diretor.

programme.title: O Doutor da Felicidade - S1E0
programme.desc: Doutor Knock é um ex-bandido que se tornou um médico e chega à pequena aldeia de Saint-Maurice para fazer os moradores acreditarem que não são saudáveis e, assim, poder exercer sua profissão de forma lucrativa.

programme.title: Nezha - Correndo pela Vida - S1E0
programme.desc: A equipe Lions de Fórmula 1 perde seu o principal piloto e coloca em seu lugar o campeão do simulador de corrida Du Jieke. Com um oponente forte e conflitos a resolver, a equipe enfrenta uma batalha feroz.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Lucia e o Cristal Mágico
programme.desc: Lucia é a primeira menina da Escola Internacional de Natal. Quando seu melhor amigo, Oscar, é acusado de roubar o cristal mágico do Rei Inverno, que alimenta a máquina atual, Lucia se propõe a provar a inocência dele.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze
programme.desc: Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3
programme.desc: Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. Donatello, Raphael e Leonardo ajudam uma vila contra o malvado Lorde Norinaga.

programme.title: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3
programme.desc: Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. Donatello, Raphael e Leonardo ajudam uma vila contra o malvado Lorde Norinaga.

programme.title: Arlo: o Porquinho Travesso
programme.desc: Sem amigos em sua nova escola, uma jovem faz amizade com Arlo, um porquinho que fugiu do circo. Mas os arrotos altos de Arlo significam que ele não será um segredo por muito tempo e, juntos, eles aprenderão o verdadeiro significado do amor e da amizade!

programme.title: Lista de Desejos de Natal
programme.desc: Sara e sua mãe, Michelle, nunca tiveram um ótimo relacionamento. Michelle é o tipo de mãe que sempre quer opinar em tudo: desde as notas de Sara na escola, a escolha de amigos, e até mesmo namorados do colégio.

programme.title: Uma Canção de Natal
programme.desc: Charlotte é nova na cidade e acontece que sua mãe tornou-se íntima do pai de quem parece que ela se tornará sua pior inimiga.

programme.title: Um conto de sereia
programme.desc: A jovem Ryan se muda para uma pacata cidade pesqueira, onde mora seu avô. Ao explorar o local, a menina encontra a sereia Coral, com quem cria uma forte amizade.

programme.title: Arlo: o Porquinho Travesso
programme.desc: Sem amigos em sua nova escola, uma jovem faz amizade com Arlo, um porquinho que fugiu do circo. Mas os arrotos altos de Arlo significam que ele não será um segredo por muito tempo e, juntos, eles aprenderão o verdadeiro significado do amor e da amizade!
